comment.author: 28179929@N08
comment._content: reads AB Yumashev. Thanks.  what do you think that the journey was some kind of fake - a book extract on  a  website says it is improbable that the plane could have made the journey, and indeed there was no visible evidence on the plane on landing showing a gruelling journey.  That would imply the US in some kind of cover-up but I don't know how...
